sqls.sql: SELECT id, pinyin_code, CODE, NAME, standard_library_id, supplier_nature, ( SELECT NAME FROM SAAS_TEST.saas_dictionary dd WHERE dd.`category` = "supplier_nature" AND dd.`value` = supplier_nature ) AS supplier_nature_name, registered_capital, legal_person, quality_head, address, area_code, tel, fax, email, business_person, business_person_tel, business_person_email, business_person_fax, business_pattern, business_variety, settlement_pattern, business_scope, bank_code, bank_name, bank_account, tax_registration_code, oraganization_code, oraganization_code_expire_date, business_license_code, business_license_expire_date, license_code, license_expire_date, gsp_code, gsp_expire_date, quality_deal, quality_deal_expire_date, medical_licence, medical_licence_expire_date, food_circulate, food_circulate_expire_date, health_care_licence, health_care__expire_date, cosmetics_licence, cosmetics_expire_date, cosmetics_health_code, cosmetics_health_expire_date, health_license, health_license_expire_date, annual_survey_prove, ( SELECT NAME FROM SAAS_TEST.saas_dictionary dd WHERE dd.`category` = "have_not" AND dd.`value` = supplier_nature ) AS annual_survey_prove_name, about_seal, ( SELECT NAME FROM SAAS_TEST.saas_dictionary dd WHERE dd.`category` = "have_not" AND dd.`value` = about_seal ) AS about_seal_name, peer_code, ( SELECT NAME FROM SAAS_TEST.saas_dictionary dd WHERE dd.`category` = "have_not" AND dd.`value` = peer_code ) AS peer_code_name, FIRST, ( SELECT NAME FROM SAAS_TEST.saas_dictionary dd WHERE dd.`category` = "has_seal" AND dd.`value` = FIRST ) AS FIRST_name, creater_id, creater_name, saas_supplier_status, create_time, update_time, proposer, proposer_time, quality_manage_evaluation, drug_business_person, drug_business_person_advice, remarks FROM SAAS_TEST.saas_supplier where id=${key}

SELECT id, pinyin_code, CODE, standard_library_id, NAME, supplier_nature, ( SELECT NAME FROM SAAS_TEST.saas_dictionary dd WHERE dd.`category` = "supplier_nature" AND dd.`value` = supplier_nature ) AS supplier_nature_name, registered_capital, legal_person, quality_head, address, area_code, tel, fax, email, business_person, business_person_tel, business_person_email, business_person_fax, business_pattern, business_variety, settlement_pattern, business_scope, bank_code, bank_name, bank_account, tax_registration_code, oraganization_code, oraganization_code_expire_date, business_license_code, business_license_expire_date, license_code, license_expire_date, gsp_code, gsp_expire_date, quality_deal, quality_deal_expire_date, medical_licence, medical_licence_expire_date, food_circulate, food_circulate_expire_date, health_care_licence, health_care__expire_date, cosmetics_licence, cosmetics_expire_date, cosmetics_health_code, cosmetics_health_expire_date, health_license, health_license_expire_date, annual_survey_prove, ( SELECT NAME FROM SAAS_TEST.saas_dictionary dd WHERE dd.`category` = "have_not" AND dd.`value` = supplier_nature ) AS annual_survey_prove_name, about_seal, ( SELECT NAME FROM SAAS_TEST.saas_dictionary dd WHERE dd.`category` = "have_not" AND dd.`value` = about_seal ) AS about_seal_name, peer_code, ( SELECT NAME FROM SAAS_TEST.saas_dictionary dd WHERE dd.`category` = "have_not" AND dd.`value` = peer_code ) AS peer_code_name, FIRST, ( SELECT NAME FROM SAAS_TEST.saas_dictionary dd WHERE dd.`category` = "has_seal" AND dd.`value` = FIRST ) AS FIRST_name, creater_id, creater_name, saas_supplier_status, CASE saas_supplier_status WHEN '0' THEN '停用' WHEN '1' THEN '启用' END AS saas_supplier_status_name, create_time, update_time, proposer, proposer_time, quality_manage_evaluation, drug_business_person, drug_business_person_advice, remarks FROM SAAS_TEST.saas_supplier where id=${key}

insert into SAAS_TEST.saas_supplier(
pinyin_code,
code,
standard_library_id,
name,
supplier_nature,
registered_capital,
legal_person,
quality_head,
address,
area_code,
tel,
fax,
email,
business_person,
business_person_tel,
business_person_email,
business_person_fax,
retrun_address,
business_pattern,
business_variety,
settlement_pattern,
business_scope,
bank_code,
bank_name,
bank_account,
tax_registration_code,
oraganization_code,
oraganization_code_expire_date,
business_license_code,
business_license_expire_date,
license_code,
license_expire_date,
gsp_code,
gsp_expire_date,
quality_deal,
quality_deal_expire_date,
medical_licence,
medical_licence_expire_date,
food_circulate,
food_circulate_expire_date,
health_care_licence,
health_care__expire_date,
cosmetics_licence,
cosmetics_expire_date,
cosmetics_health_code,
cosmetics_health_expire_date,
health_license,
health_license_expire_date,
annual_survey_prove,
about_seal,
peer_code,
first,
creater_id,
creater_name,
saas_supplier_status,
proposer,
proposer_time,
quality_manage_evaluation,
drug_business_person,
drug_business_person_advice,
remarks,
create_time, ) values(
${pinyin_code},
${code},
${standard_library_id},
${name},
${supplier_nature},
${registered_capital},
${legal_person},
${quality_head},
${address},
${area_code},
${tel},
${fax},
${email},
${business_person},
${business_person_tel},
${business_person_email},
${business_person_fax},
${retrun_address},
${business_pattern},
${business_variety},
${settlement_pattern},
${business_scope},
${bank_code},
${bank_name},
${bank_account},
${tax_registration_code},
${oraganization_code},
${oraganization_code_expire_date},
${business_license_code},
${business_license_expire_date},
${license_code},
${license_expire_date},
${gsp_code},
${gsp_expire_date},
${quality_deal},
${quality_deal_expire_date},
${medical_licence},
${medical_licence_expire_date},
${food_circulate},
${food_circulate_expire_date},
${health_care_licence},
${health_care__expire_date},
${cosmetics_licence},
${cosmetics_expire_date},
${cosmetics_health_code},
${cosmetics_health_expire_date},
${health_license},
${health_license_expire_date},
${annual_survey_prove},
${about_seal},
${peer_code},
${first},
${creater_id},
${creater_name},
${saas_supplier_status},
${proposer},
${proposer_time},
${quality_manage_evaluation},
${drug_business_person},
${drug_business_person_advice},
${remarks},
now(), )

update SAAS_TEST.saas_supplier set
pinyin_code=${pinyin_code},
standard_library_id=${standard_library_id},
name=${NAME},
supplier_nature=${supplier_nature},
registered_capital=${registered_capital},
legal_person=${legal_person},
quality_head=${quality_head},
address=${address},
area_code=${area_code},
tel=${tel},
fax=${fax},
email=${email},
business_person=${business_person},
business_person_tel=${business_person_tel},
business_person_email=${business_person_email},
business_person_fax=${business_person_fax},
retrun_address=${retrun_address},
business_pattern=${business_pattern},
business_variety=${business_variety},
settlement_pattern=${settlement_pattern},
business_scope=${business_scope},
bank_code=${bank_code},
bank_name=${bank_name},
bank_account=${bank_account},
tax_registration_code=${tax_registration_code},
oraganization_code=${oraganization_code},
oraganization_code_expire_date=${oraganization_code_expire_date},
business_license_code=${business_license_code},
business_license_expire_date=${business_license_expire_date},
license_code=${license_code},
license_expire_date=${license_expire_date},
gsp_code=${gsp_code},
gsp_expire_date=${gsp_expire_date},
quality_deal=${quality_deal},
quality_deal_expire_date=${quality_deal_expire_date},
medical_licence=${medical_licence},
medical_licence_expire_date=${medical_licence_expire_date},
food_circulate=${food_circulate},
food_circulate_expire_date=${food_circulate_expire_date},
health_care_licence=${health_care_licence},
health_care__expire_date=${health_care__expire_date},
cosmetics_licence=${cosmetics_licence},
cosmetics_expire_date=${cosmetics_expire_date},
cosmetics_health_code=${cosmetics_health_code},
cosmetics_health_expire_date=${cosmetics_health_expire_date},
health_license=${health_license},
health_license_expire_date=${health_license_expire_date},
annual_survey_prove=${annual_survey_prove},
about_seal=${about_seal},
peer_code=${peer_code},
first=${first},
creater_id=${creater_id},
creater_name=${creater_name},
modifier_id=${modifier_id},
modifier_name=${modifier_name},
saas_supplier_status=${saas_supplier_status},
proposer=${proposer},
proposer_time=${proposer_time},
quality_manage_evaluation=${quality_manage_evaluation},
drug_business_person=${drug_business_person},
drug_business_person_advice=${drug_business_person_advice},
remarks=${remarks},
update_time=now(), where id=${key}

update SAAS_TEST.saas_supplier set saas_supplier_status = '0' where
id= ${id}

update SAAS_TEST.saas_supplier set saas_supplier_status = '1' where
id= ${id}
SELECT CASE WHEN '0' = saas_supplier_status THEN 'false' ELSE 'true' END AS mustBreak FROM SAAS_TEST.saas_supplier WHERE id = ${id}
SELECT CASE WHEN '0' = saas_supplier_status THEN 'true' ELSE 'false' END AS mustBreak FROM SAAS_TEST.saas_supplier WHERE id = ${id}

insert into saas_serial_number(type, date, num ) select 'supplier_num', now(), IFNULL((select num FROM SAAS_TEST.saas_serial_number WHERE type = 'supplier_num' order by num desc LIMIT 0,1),0)+1 as num;

SELECT CASE WHEN ${supplier_nature}=0 THEN CONCAT('P',LPAD(num,4,'0')) WHEN ${supplier_nature}=1 THEN CONCAT('S',LPAD(num,4,'0')) END AS code FROM SAAS_TEST.saas_serial_number WHERE type = 'supplier_num' order by num desc LIMIT 0,1;

condition.name: business_variety_name
condition.title: 经营品种
condition.sql: select a.value id,a.name text from SAAS_TEST.saas_dictionary a where a.category = 'business_variety'

condition.name: business_scope_name
condition.title: 经营范围
condition.sql: select a.value id,a.name text from SAAS_TEST.saas_dictionary a where a.category = 'business_scope'

condition.name: supplier_nature
condition.title: 供货单位性质
condition.sql: select a.value id,a.name text from SAAS_TEST.saas_dictionary a where a.category = 'supplier_nature'

condition.name: settlement_pattern
condition.title: 结算方式
condition.sql: select a.value id,a.name text from SAAS_TEST.saas_dictionary a where a.category = 'settlement_pattern'

condition.name: annual_survey_prove
condition.title: 年检证明
condition.sql: select a.value id,a.name text from SAAS_TEST.saas_dictionary a where a.category = 'have_not'

condition.name: about_seal
condition.title: 相关印章
condition.sql: select a.value id,a.name text from SAAS_TEST.saas_dictionary a where a.category = 'have_not'

condition.name: peer_code
condition.title: 随货同行单样式
condition.sql: select a.value id,a.name text from SAAS_TEST.saas_dictionary a where a.category = 'have_not'

condition.title: 经营品种
condition.sql: select a.value id,a.name text from SAAS_TEST.saas_dictionary a where a.category = 'business_variety'

condition.title: 经营范围

condition.name: FIRST
condition.title: 首营
condition.sql: select a.value id,a.name text from SAAS_TEST.saas_dictionary a where a.category = 'has_seal'
